titleStmt.title: The Owles almanacke prognosticating many strange accidents which shall happen to this kingdome of Great Britaine this yeere, 1618 : calculated as well for the meridian mirth of London, as any other part of Great Britaine : found in an Iuy-bush written in old characters / and now published in English by the painefull labours of Mr. Iocundary Merry-braines.
titleStmt.author: Dekker, Thomas, ca. 1572-1632.
L. L.
Merry-braines, Jocundary.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.G. for Lawrence Lisle, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Tygres head,

notesStmt.note: Probably erroneously attributed to Thomas Dekker--Cf. STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Tygres head
